mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.`name`, a.category_id categoryId, b.`name` categoryName, b.`level` FROM pms_attribute_key a, pms_category b WHERE a.category_id = b.id
SELECT t.id, t.`name`, t.category_id categoryId FROM pms_attribute_key t WHERE t.id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE pms_attribute_key t SET t.category_id = #{categoryId}, t.`name` = #{name} WHERE t.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pms_attribute_value(attribute_id, attribute_value) VALUES (#{attributeId}, #{attributeValue}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE attribute_value = #{attributeValue} WHERE attribute_id = #{attributeId}
mapper.select: SELECT t.attribute_id attributeId, t.attribute_value attributeValue FROM pms_attribute_value t WHERE t.attribute_id = #{attributeId}
